H0.text: Doldrums are narrow belts of strong winds found in the upper troposphere.

H1.text: Westerlies are narrow belts of strong winds found in the upper troposphere.

H2.text: Trade winds are narrow belts of strong winds found in the upper troposphere.

H3.text: Jet streams are narrow belts of strong winds found in the upper troposphere.

A4.text: The polar jet stream... located near the 250 hPa... above sea level while the weaker subtropical jet streams are somewhat higher.
